name: krakend
tagline: An API gateway for aggregating securing and scaling services
description: KrakenD CE is an API gateway and aggregator that sits in front of microservices. It combines and transforms responses, handles rate limiting and authentication, and lets teams define configurations as code for scalable API front ends.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Unified entry point for microservices with request routing. Simplify API architecture

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Ultra-fast request processing with low latency and high throughput. Handle massive traffic

features.title: Authentication
features.description: JWT validation, OAuth2, and API key authentication. Secure API access

features.title: Load Balancing
features.description: Distribute requests across multiple backend instances. Ensure high availability
